definition: instinctively or temperamentally seeking and enjoying the company of others
details:
adjective
- instinctively or temperamentally seeking and enjoying the company of others
= example: instinctively or temperamentally seeking and enjoying the company of others
- of animals, tending to form a group with others of the same species
= example: of animals, tending to form a group with others of the same species
- of plants, growing in groups that are close together
= example: of plants, growing in groups that are close together
